name: Image Viewer
description: Preview uploaded images or pdfs files on a form/survey

versions.0.2: Working and simplified version that is almost exclusively javascript

versions.1.3: Added support for PDF files as well in addition to improving the preview of newly uploaded files

versions.1.3.1: Made a minor fix in the ActionTag class that was calling an external class not included in the module

versions.1.3.2: Supports embedding PDFs from descriptive fields as well

system-settings.name:
OPTIONAL
Leave blank for no logging.
Enter a valid server logging path to enable module logging (e.g. 
/var/log/image_viewer.log
)
If the log path is not valid, it will log to the php_error log

project-settings.name: Configure one or more file-upload fields to activate ImageViewer preview:

sub_settings.name:
Field with attachment
This field should be of the type file-upload or a descriptive field with an attached file

Optional
Parameters entered here can be used to customize the behavior as new features are added. The format is valid json strings. For example, to force the height, try
{ "height": "500px" }
